inputs.name: artifact-type
inputs.description: The artifact that was scanned. Supported values - “containerImage”

inputs.name: artifact-id
inputs.description: Unique identifier for the artifact. For artifact-type “containerImage”, the action will take the image digest by default by using docker cli

inputs.name: subscription-token
inputs.description: ASC subscription token which can be found on the ASC portal

inputs.name: instrumentation-key
inputs.description: Instrumentation key of the application insights instance

inputs.name: connection-string
inputs.description: Connection string of the application insights instance

inputs.name: scan-provider
inputs.description: The tool used to scan the artifact. Supported values - "trivy"

inputs.name: scan-results-path
inputs.description: Path to the file containing scan results
